body.p: When sufficient information is not available to use defined benefit accounting for a multi‑employer defined benefit plan, an entity shall:

li.p: account for the plan in accordance with paragraphs 51 and 52 as if it were a defined contribution plan; and
disclose the information required by paragraph 148.
